text:
Miss Margery M rris
c/o Mr. Dean Gregory
Apartment 2H, International House
500 Riverside Drive
New York 27, New York
Dear Miss Morris:
We are enclosing your July check in the amount of $662.40.
Before you leave there is one other matter which we need to have you
take care of. Would you please complete the information requested on
the enclosed Certificate of Non-Residence in the District of Columbia
and send it to us right away.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
JAF:sc
Enclosures
